doc.title: Behind the Player: John 5
doc.plot: John 5 has played with Marilyn Manson, K.D. Lang, Rob Halford, David Lee Roth and currently Rob Zombie. John 5 gives an intimate behind-the scenes look at his life as a professional musician - including rare photos and video footage. John 5 then gives in-depth guitar lessons for how to play "Let it All Bleed Out" and "Lords of Salem" by Rob Zombie and jams "Lords of Salem" with Rob Zombie drummer Tommy Clufetos.
